id.description: Played by French actress Marion Cotillard.

aspects.aspect: Populist With a Genuine Sense of Duty to the People of Canopy
What If the Slogans Aren't Really a Solution?
Canopy is Better Off Alone Than Assimilated
No Deal Is Better Than a Bad Deal

character.notes: Combines various aspects of the Democratic-Republicans who entered the US Congress around 1800, UKIP and pro-Brexit politicans in the modern UK, and the autarkical Trumpian wing of the GOP. These positions are tempered by the serious concern that Canopy will get fully assimilated into insignificance.
